H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H4938.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► used for walking or as attribute of a ruler, shepherd, or prophet; gives support to the sick and elderly; ≈ associated with authority and support

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

83.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H7080.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H2572.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H3289.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

H2450.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H2791.def: = person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H3908.def: = action by which people talk softly among themselves to keep others from overhearing

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H5065.def: = a person who forces humans and animals to perform certain activities

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H8071.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H7101.def: = a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4384.def: = a building that has been destroyed or that has collapsed

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2280.def: = state in which something has been wrapped around part of someone's body

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H8071.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H7101.def: = a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice

42.gl: to place (in a position) > to appoint

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3782.def: = process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H4611.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4784.def: = action by which humans reject the authority of a ruler or deity to which they had formerly been subjected

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

42.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1971.def: literally: knowing (soneone's) face; hence: = action with which humans favor one side in a dispute over the other

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H5467.def: = town; ◄ located near {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; ► town where {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} settled, when he separated himself from {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; destroyed with {L:Gomorrah<SDBH:עֲמֹרָה>}

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H3582.def: = state in which humans are unaware of certain information

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H1580.def: = causative process by which a mother causes her baby to become accustomed to food other than its mother's milk

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6662.def: = state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H6529.def: = produce from crop-bearing trees and plants

H4611.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

16.gl: to eat the fruits > to bear the consequences

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H1576.def: = action by which humans act towards other humans or deities in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H5065.def: = a person who forces humans and animals to perform certain activities

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H833.def: literally: to go forward on a road; hence: = to behave in a certain way

H1104.def: = action by which humans or animals cause food to pass down from their mouth to their esophagus; ≈ often used figuratively to denote destruction and death

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H734.def: = relatively narrow {L:road<SDBH:דֶּרֶךְ>} that connects two locations and facilitates travelling

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5324.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H1197.def: = process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H1500.def: = objects taken unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H1792.def: = causative action by which an object is deformed or pulverized by exerting heavy pressure on it

H2912.def: = causative action by which humans reduce objects to tiny particles or powder with the help of a hand-mill or larger millstone; ≈ regarded as a menial task

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H1361.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1627.def: = the passage which leads from the back of the mouth of humans in the direction of the lungs; ► internally, it functions as a passageway for food and breath; externally, it is a place around which ornaments can be placed; ≈ associated with food and speaking

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H8265.def: = action by which humans look at other humans with lust

H2952.def: = to walk in a distinctive manner ► to call attention to one's presumed attractiveness

H5913.def: = causative action by which women cause their anklets to produce a tinkling sound ► in order to attract attention

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

24.gl: to stretch out (part of one's body)

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H6936.def: = upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with "{L:feet<SDBH:רֶגֶל>}" to refer to the whole physical body

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6596.def: exact meaning uncertain; probably: = the pivot on which a door turns

H6168.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause the outer layer covering an object to be removed

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5914.def: = ornament; ◄ made of metal; ► worn around the ankle

H7636.def: = a narrow band of cloth, leather or other material, worn around the head

H7720.def: = ornaments in the curved shape of the waxing or waning moon

H8285.def: = object made by an artist; ◄ usually made out of precious metal; ► worn on the arm as decoration or charm

H7479.def: = piece of cloth, worn by women around their head and shoulders ► for ornamentation

H6287.def: = head-dress; ◄ made out of cloth; ► worn by priests, but also by ordinary men and women, probably on special occasions; not to be worn when in mourning; ≈ therefore associated with joy

H7196.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = part of female attire, worn around the body

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3908.def: = action by which people talk softly among themselves to keep others from overhearing

H2885.def: = a small circular band with an engraved design on the top; ◄ usually made of gold; ► worn on the finger and used as a marker of identity as well as for personal adornment; ≈ regarded as valuable and attractive

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5141.def: = ring; ◄ made out of silver or gold; ► worn for personal adornment, either in the ear or in the nose

H4254.def: = long garment of high quality, hanging down to the ankles, to be worn by priests or during festivities

H4595.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = overgarment that hangs loosely from the shoulders

H4304.def: exact meaning unsure; possible: = relatively large piece of fabric worn by women over the shoulders and/or head

H2754.def: = kind of receptacle; ◄ originally made out of bark; ► possibly used for carrying money

H1549.def: = small, flat tablet, ◄ probably made of wood or metal, ► on which words were scratched with a {L:stylus<SDBH:חֶרֶט>}

H7289.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = piece of cloth, worn by women around their head and shoulders as protection against the cold, and possibly for reasons of modesty as well

H1314.def: = tree of 2-3 meters tall, with small, wrinkled, three-part leaves, white flowers, and pea-sized red berries that have a fragrant yellow seed inside; the bark of younger branches is gray, turning brown with age; it grows in desert or semi-desert climates; ◄ Opobalsamum; ► the tree is wanted for its resin, which appears by itself in green droplets from the stems and branches, but collectors also make cuts in the branches to speed the process; the droplets turn from green to brown, clump together, and fall to the ground, where they are collected; the resin is used in holy anointing oil, as medicine, and as an ingredient of perfume

H5364.def: = piece of cord; ◄ made by twisting together strands of hemp, sisal, flax, cotton, or similar material; ► used as a cheap alternative for a belt

H4639.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H4748.def: literally: workmanship of dressed hair; hence: = an elaborate hairdo, requiring the work of a hairdresser

H7144.def: = a hairless patch on the head of an animal or human being in a location where hair normally grows; ≈ this can be a natural phenomenon, as on the head of a vulture, but it can also be created by shaving the head as a sign of mourning

H4228.def: = state in which someone wears a piece of cloth around the waist

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H3308.def: = state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye

H4962.def: = human beings, regardless of sex and age

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H1369.def: = the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H578.def: = action by which humans give expression to their grief, ◄ caused by death of a relative or friend or by extreme hardship

H56.def: = to experience grief and show this by one's actions; ◄ caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances

H5352.def: literally: to be cleaned out; hence: = causative action by which a city is deprived of its inhabitants

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
